Epic_Arsenal_Essential_Elements_Demo_Packs version 1.3 07/08/2016

Package Contents
----------------

1) This README file
2) files Epic_Arsenal_Essential_Elements_Demo_Packs
3) 103 number of audio assets in .wav format
4) 103 number of audio assets in 16bit 44.1k format
5) Epic Stock Media End User License Agreement (EULA)


Description
-----------

Epic_Arsenal_Essential_Elements_Demo_Packs is a sound effects library created and produced by Epic Stock Media. The library presents a diverse set of audio assets that are particularly useful to game and software developers, sound designers and producers. 

We encourage you to offer comments and make suggestions, ask questions, or tell us what you'd like to see in new products. Email: info@epicstockmedia.com. We appreciate your feedback. 


Technical Requirements
----------------------

 Playback of files can be achieved with modern digital audio workstations, game and software development platforms and with any device that can process the included .wav and 16bit 44.1k format audio files.

--------------------------------------

License and use of this product is subject to the Epic Stock Media EULA. The EULA is included in this package and can also be found at: http://epicstockmedia.com/home/license-agreement.html.
